com.diffplug.common.swt

Interface Coat

  • Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Coat
    For populating composites.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Coat.Returning<T>
      A Coat which returns a handle to the content it created.
      static interface  Coat.Reusable<T>
      A Coat with the ability to be hidden, redisplayed, and deduplicated.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Coat.Reusable<Coat> asNeverReusedReusable(Coat client)
      Transforms a Coat into a Coat.Reusable which promises to never be reused.
      static Coat empty()
      Coat which does nothing.
      void putOn(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite cmp)
      Populates the given composite.

    • Method Detail

      • putOn

        void putOn(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite cmp)
        Populates the given composite. Caller promises that the composite has no layout and contains no children.

      • empty

        static Coat empty()
        Coat which does nothing.

      • asNeverReusedReusable

        static Coat.Reusable<Coat> asNeverReusedReusable(Coat client)
        Transforms a Coat into a Coat.Reusable which promises to never be reused.
